stuttgart-msc.title: Master's in Computer Science
stuttgart-msc.description: I am presently working on my Master's in Computer Science at the University of Stuttgart. Wish me luck!

db-analyst.title: Senior Software Analyst
db-analyst.description: I worked as a Senior Software Analyst at Deutsche Bank, where I was involved in developing and maintaining software solutions for the bank's operations. My role included collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software products.

vit-btech.title: Bachelor's in Computer Engineering
vit-btech.description: I studied computer engineering with a focus on software development and machine learning. After four years of study, I graduated with a GPA of 9.91 which earned me the Awards of Best Outgoing Student and Overall Topper within my batch.

db-intern.title: Software Intern
db-intern.description: I worked as an Intern contributing to projects (Dev and on Prod) in Treasury Technology. Interacted with the technologies being used in the industry today in fields like web development, systems design and database management.

gsoc.title: Open Source Volunteer
gsoc.description: My project was to build the Apertium Web Extension, a cross-browser supported extension that serves as an interface for the Apertium translation service. It allows for translation of words, phrases, entire webpages as well as for hover-on gist translations.
